original_title: I'm Not In Love (How To Feed On Humans)
overview: "I'm Not in Love" restores the tired motif of the vampire, injecting it with a sense of queer warmth. In this freakish and playful combination of narrative film and music video, a 386 year-old-Asian vampire- Vampy- struts about town tending to his three lovers/symbionts
title: I'm Not In Love (How To Feed On Humans)
